name: NEIPv6Route
desc: NEIPv6Route contains settings for an IPv6 route.

items.name: class func `default`() -> NEIPv6Route
items.desc: A convenience method for creating the default IPv4 route.

items.name: var destinationAddress: String
items.desc: The destination network address of the route.

items.name: var destinationNetworkPrefixLength: NSNumber
items.desc: The destination network prefix length of the route.

items.name: var gatewayAddress: String?
items.desc: The address of the next-hop gateway of the route.
